name: Trials of the Illuminati: Sea Creatures Jigsaws
name_original: Trials of the Illuminati: Sea Creatures Jigsaws
description:
Twelve different jigsaws in three difficulty levels*2 including:

Squids
Lobsters
Octopus
Sea Turtle
Spotted Eel
Japanese Spider Crab
Clown Fish with Sea Anemone
And more!

A calm and relaxing experience with hours of entertainment!
